messages.body: Sad but true? $TSLA http://seekingalpha.com/article/4001995-short-tesla-stock-still-fooling

links.title: If You're Short Tesla Stock, You're Still Fooling Yourself
links.description: Tesla Motors (NASDAQ: TSLA) has been put through the meat grinder in recent months as analysts have gradually lowered once-optimistic outlooks and the narrative has shifted from innovative growth company to Elon Musk's personal party bus. Under Musk's leadership, Tesla has made some questionable decisions, chief among them the SolarCity (NASDAQ: SCTY) acquisition, in my opinion.

links.title: Investors Are Turning Their Attention To Fed Chair
links.description: Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 13:15 - 6.1MB) DOW - 65 = 18,481 SPX - 11 = 2175 NAS - 42 = 5217 10 Y + .02 = 1.56% OIL - 1.30 = 46.80 GOLD - 13.10 = 1324.80 Today marks the first anniversary of a chaotic day in the markets.The S&P 500 lost 77.7 points, or 3.9%, and China's Shanghai Composite crashed more than 8%, less than a week after the People's Bank of China announced it was devaluing its currency.
